course_description: Suggested prerequisite: Political Science 110. This course delves into the philosophical and contextual underpinnings of human rights in order to create a framework for understanding the increasing importance of human rights in the international system.
sections: Class Nbr: 2733, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: C. Michota, Status: Open
